root.name: Nancy Drew: The Creature of Kapu Cave
root.description: Loosely based on the Nancy Dew book: Mystery on Maui, Nancy Drew: Creature of Kapu is the 15th in the long running computer game franchise. While visiting as a research assistant in Hawaii, Nancy Drew comes across Dr. Kim's camp, but the doctor is missing! Could his disappearance be linked to the legendary Kane 'Okala?Â It seems only by teaming up with the Hardy Boys will Nancy get to the bottom of this mystery!
